column2: Alaska Air to form codeshare deal with Japan Airlines May 10 Alaska Air Group Inc on Tuesday announced plans for a codeshare agreement and a frequent flier partnership with Japan Airlines Co Ltd.

column2: MOVES-Wells Fargo names Dreyer head of IG loan syndications LONDON
column3: May 10 (IFR) - Wells Fargo has hired former Bank of America Merrill Lynch banker Shaun Dreyer to head its investment-grade loan syndications business.
